import React from 'react'; import './categoryList.css'; // Create a CSS file for styling import { FaEdit, FaTrash, FaEye } from 'react-icons/fa'; // Example icons function CategoryList() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const categories = [ { id: 1, name: 'Electronics', arabicName: 'إلكترونيات', subCategories: 5, subSubCategories: 10, status: 'Active', lastUpdated: '2023-10-01', specification: 'Various electronic items', }, // Add more category objects as needed ]; return (

); } export default CategoryList;
